EmailTemplate.description: 20150615 Rescheduled Event - Y3 & Y4 Sports Day
EmailTemplate.name: 20150615 Rescheduled Event - Y3 & Y4 Sports Day
EmailTemplate.subject: Rescheduled Event - Y3 & Y4 Sports Day
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Rescheduled event - Year 3 and 4 Sports Day
We have decided to continue with the rest of the Year 3 and 4 Sports Day tomorrow, Tuesday 16th June. The event will commence at 8.30am just as it did today.
Thank you for your support today; the children were really enjoying their events before the rain set in.
I look forward to seeing many of you at the New Camp sports facility tomorrow.
Kind regards,
Mrs. Alison Mackey
Deputy Head of Primary
British International School Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
_________________________________________________________ Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
